column3: <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>Good evening<Else/>Good morning</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>Good afternoon<Else/>Good evening</If></If> and welcome to Worlar's Echo, home of the Yok Huy. I can scarcely remember the last time this village received visitors other than the occasional Pelupelu merchant.
With Valigarmanda on the loose, all I ask is that you let me speak of this land, that we might live on in your memory.
Suffice it to say you have well and truly left your mark on our history. Thanks to you, our memory will live on for some time yet. In return, might I tell you of our culture?
The hero who slew Valigarmanda has been crowned Dawnservant, has she? A most joyous moment in history. Indeed, I may even mark the event on my gravestone.
What manner of place is this?

Me? Well, most days I make sure everyone in the village gets enough to eat. I have also been charged with welcoming outsiders, as there are scant few among us confident in their command of the common tongue.
I do not think myself especially eloquent compared to my neighbors here, but please do forgive us if we mispronounce a word or two.
Even should the Skyruin sear our flesh and bones, I am content knowing I will live on in your memory. You must flee from here before you join us in our fate!
Worlar's Echo: where the clattering of stone upon stone gave rise to a great mountain. It is where the Yok Huy began, and it is where we will one day end.
Isolated as we are from the rest of Tural, ours is a homogenous community. We seek only to live in peace with our ancestors and maintain the ancient stonework they've entrusted to us.
